title: Maha Ever After
description: A few years wiser, Maha is back – and living in the palatial home of her in-laws, the well-to-do Patels. But it’s not quite the happily-ever-after she thought it would be, and her husband, Sameer, that very “Suitable Boy”, seems just a tad too distracted . . .When Maha discovers her husband’s infidelity she demands a divorce, risking the stern disapproval of the entire community and devastating her grandparents.
author: Sumayya Lee
